In this blog, I am going to use various R packages mainly from the tidyverse package by [Hadley wickham](http://hadley.nz/) to analyze tweets from [lordmwesh](https://twitter.com/lordmwesh) twitter.

[lordmwesh](https://twitter.com/lordmwesh) was generous enough to share his twitter archive comprising over 20K tweets
